dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT ob.order_base_xid order_base_id, obr.remark_text, gu.gl_user_xid insert_user, TO_CHAR(from_tz(CAST(obr.insert_date AS TIMESTAMP), 'GMT') AT TIME ZONE 'US/Central', 'MM/DD/YY HH:MI PM') note_time FROM ob_order_base ob INNER JOIN ob_remark obr ON ob.order_base_gid = obr.order_base_gid AND obr.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.INTERNAL NOTES' INNER JOIN gl_user gu ON obr.insert_user = gu.gl_user_gid WHERE ob.order_base_gid = :CONTRACT_ID ORDER BY obr.insert_date ASC
